publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Wilson at the sign of the Three-Foxes in Long-lane,

notesStmt.note: Includes commendatory verses signed: R. C. in Art. Magist. [i.e. R. Cheyney, to whom the work is dedicated?--cf. Pforzheimer Catalogue].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
